# Third-party components

- `third_party/pico-sdk/`: pinned local snapshot used by `pico_sdk_import.cmake`.
- `third_party/FreeRTOS-Kernel/`: minimal kernel sources used by this build.
- `third_party/FatFS/`: FatFS source used for mount and file-read path.
- `third_party/PicoDVI_or_TMDS/`: deterministic DVI/TMDS baseline path (S4 path b).

See `third_party/LICENSES/` for license texts.
